gobblin.runtime.job_catalog

Class StaticJobCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.JobCatalogBase
        • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.StaticJobCatalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, Instrumentable, JobCatalog, JobCatalogListenersContainer

    public class StaticJobCatalog
extends JobCatalogBase
    A JobCatalog with a static collection of JobSpecs defined at construction time.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(JobCatalogListener jobListener)
        Description copied from class: JobCatalogBase
        Adds a JobCatalogListener that will be invoked upon updates on the JobCatalog. Upon registration JobCatalogListener.onAddJob(JobSpec) will be invoked for all pre-existing jobs in the JobCatalog.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface JobCatalogListenersContainer
        Overrides:
        addListener in class JobCatalogBase

      • getJobs

        public Collection<JobSpec> getJobs()

        Description copied from class: JobCatalogBase
